Data: please add the ethical approval number under which the animal experiments were performed
Metadata: which metadata is used for your MRI and EP data?
Storage: will you use biological samples? if so please add them to the data table
Preservation: please note that the KU Leuven RDM policy asks for 10 years of data preservation: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/policy
